original_text: The Israelites obeyed Moses. They asked the Egyptians for silver and gold. They also asked them for clothes.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 모세의 말대로 하여 애굽 사람에게 은금 패물과 의복을 구하매

sentences.original_text: They asked the Egyptians for silver and gold.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이집트 사람들에게 은과 금을 요청했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They also asked them for clothes.
